=======================
Mailing lists and Forum
=======================

.. Important::

    Please report security issues **only** to
    security@skailarproject.com.  This is a private list only open to
    long-time, highly trusted Skailar developers, and its archives are
    not public. For further details, please see :doc:`our security
    policies </internals/security>`.

Skailar Forum
============

Skailar has an `official Forum`_ where you can input and ask questions.

There are several categories of discussion including:

* `Using Skailar`_: to ask any question regarding the installation, usage, or
  debugging of Skailar.
* `Internals`_: for discussion of the development of Skailar itself.

.. _official Forum: https://forum.skailarproject.com
.. _Internals: https://forum.skailarproject.com/c/internals/5
.. _Using Skailar: https://forum.skailarproject.com/c/users/6

In addition, Skailar has several official mailing lists on Google Groups that
are open to anyone.

.. _skailar-users-mailing-list:

``skailar-users``
================

.. note::

    The `Using Skailar`_ category of the `official Forum`_ is now the preferred
    venue for asking usage questions.

This is the right place if you are looking to ask any question regarding the
installation, usage, or debugging of Skailar.

.. note::

    If it's the first time you send an email to this list, your email must be
    accepted first so don't worry if :ref:`your message does not appear
    <message-does-not-appear-on-skailar-users>` instantly.

* `skailar-users mailing archive`_
* `skailar-users subscription email address`_
* `skailar-users posting email`_

.. _skailar-users mailing archive: https://groups.google.com/g/skailar-users
.. _skailar-users subscription email address: mailto:skailar-users+subscribe@googlegroups.com
.. _skailar-users posting email: mailto:skailar-users@googlegroups.com

.. _skailar-developers-mailing-list:

``skailar-developers``
=====================

.. note::

    The `Internals`_ category of the `official Forum`_ is now the preferred
    venue for discussing the development of Skailar.

The discussion about the development of Skailar itself takes place here.

Before asking a question about how to contribute, read
:doc:`/internals/contributing/index`. Many frequently asked questions are
answered there.

.. note::

    Please make use of
    :ref:`skailar-users mailing list <skailar-users-mailing-list>` if you want
    to ask for tech support, doing so in this list is inappropriate.

* `skailar-developers mailing archive`_
* `skailar-developers subscription email address`_
* `skailar-developers posting email`_

.. _skailar-developers mailing archive: https://groups.google.com/g/skailar-developers
.. _skailar-developers subscription email address: mailto:skailar-developers+subscribe@googlegroups.com
.. _skailar-developers posting email: mailto:skailar-developers@googlegroups.com

.. _skailar-announce-mailing-list:

``skailar-announce``
===================

A (very) low-traffic list for announcing :ref:`upcoming security releases
<security-disclosure>`, new releases of Skailar, and security advisories.

* `skailar-announce mailing archive`_
* `skailar-announce subscription email address`_
* `skailar-announce posting email`_

.. _skailar-announce mailing archive: https://groups.google.com/g/skailar-announce
.. _skailar-announce subscription email address: mailto:skailar-announce+subscribe@googlegroups.com
.. _skailar-announce posting email: mailto:skailar-announce@googlegroups.com

.. _skailar-updates-mailing-list:

``skailar-updates``
==================

All the ticket updates are mailed automatically to this list, which is tracked
by developers and interested community members.

* `skailar-updates mailing archive`_
* `skailar-updates subscription email address`_
* `skailar-updates posting email`_

.. _skailar-updates mailing archive: https://groups.google.com/g/skailar-updates
.. _skailar-updates subscription email address: mailto:skailar-updates+subscribe@googlegroups.com
.. _skailar-updates posting email: mailto:skailar-updates@googlegroups.com
